pages.text: $(item)Anointments$() are essentially $(item)potions$() for your tools, weapons, and even your $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/explosive_charges)Charges$(). By right-clicking with the $(item)anointment$() in one hand, it will be applied to the item in your other hand, if possible. Not all anointments work on all equipment! $(br2)Unlike $(item)potions$(), $(item)anointments$() aren't timed; rather, they wear off a bit at a time as your tool or weapon is used.

pages.heading: Slate-infused Vial
pages.text: A sturdy Vial that can contain otherwise uncontainable mixtures.

pages.heading: Honing Oil
pages.text: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt by +3. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Whetstone I (256 hits)

pages.heading: Fortuna Extract
pages.text: Increases the yield of some harvested blocks. Also stacks with the Fortune enchantment. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Fortunate I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Soft Coating
pages.text: Applies Silk Touch to blocks harvested. Does not stack with the vanilla enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Soft Touch I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Holy Water
pages.text: Temporarily increases the melee damage dealt to undead mobs by +5. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Holy Light I (256 hits)

pages.heading: Miner's Secrets
pages.text: Blocks drop exp on successful harvest. Drops +2exp per block. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Iron Tip
pages.text: Increases the damage of fired arrows by 25%. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (256 shots)

pages.heading: Dexterity Alkahest
pages.text: Lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 33%. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (256 shots)

pages.heading: Plunderer's Glint
pages.text: Increases the drops from killed mobs. Also stacks with the Looting enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Plundering I (256 hits)

pages.heading: Slow-burning Oil
pages.text: Uses heat to smelt harvested blocks. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges. $(br2)Applies: Heated Tool I (256 blocks)
